commands: OUT="$(TMPDIR=/tmp mktemp -t pyinfra.XXXXXX)" &&  awk '/# BEGIN PYINFRA BLOCK/,/# END PYINFRA BLOCK/ {next} 1' /home/someone/something > $OUT && chmod $(stat -c %a /home/someone/something 2>/dev/null || stat -f %Lp /home/someone/something ) $OUT &&  (chown $(stat -c "%U:%G" /home/someone/something 2>/dev/null) $OUT ||  chown -n $(stat -f "%u:%g" /home/someone/something ) $OUT)  && mv "$OUT" /home/someone/something
